title: Christian
content:
see [Christianity](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christianity)

**Type Designers named Christian:**  
 [Christian Acker](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Acker) ( [24 HRS](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/24%20HRS), [Sailor Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sailor%20Gothic))  
 [Christian Bauer](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Bauer) ( [Linotype Compendio](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype%20Compendio))  
 [Johann Christian Bauer](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Johann%20Christian%20Bauer) ( [Englische Schriftschneiderei und Gravieranstalt](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Englische%20Schriftschneiderei%20und%20Gravieranstalt))  
 [Christian Goetz](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Goetz) ( [Linotype Minos](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype%20Minos))  
 [Christian Küsters](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20K%C3%BCsters)  
 [Christian Mengelt](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Mengelt) ( [ITC Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC%20Avant%20Garde%20Gothic))  
 [Christian Oppenberg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Oppenberg)  
 [Christian Paput](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Paput)  
 [Christian Robertson](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Robertson) ( [Pill Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pill%20Gothic), [DearSarah](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/DearSarah))  
 [Christian Schwartz](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Schwartz) (various fonts: see [Orange Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Orange%20Italic))  
 [Christian Terbeck](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Terbeck) ( [EF Tempodrom](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/EF%20Tempodrom))  
 [Christian Vornehm](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Vornehm) ( [Linotype Seven](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035139/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype%20Seven))
author: Forrest L Norvell
